technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant mentions the pandemic but does not express strong negative affect.
past_neg_affect: The participant recalls feeling concerned and scared during the early stages of the pandemic.
communal_orientation: The participant engages in conversation and asks questions, but does not go above and beyond to relate to the conversation partner.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and shares their experiences openly.
defensiveness: The participant does not exhibit any defensive behavior.

questions.transcript: What was your experience like with vaccination?

vaccine_importance: The participant got the vaccine to travel, but had bad side effects and is not planning on getting any more.
booster_importance: The participant does not plan on getting any more boosters.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and experiences related to the pandemic and vaccinations.
general_notes: The participant had a bad reaction to the vaccine and is not planning on getting any more.
